projects.title: FireArchy
projects.description: Created a system combining NASA FIRMS API data with a mobile app and hardware alarm to notify users (and at-risk relatives) when wildfires approach.

projects.title: MediConnect
projects.description: Built a product to translate prescriptions into local equivalents, locate nearby pharmacies/hospitals, and auto-translate preloaded patient records for emergency responders.

projects.title: The LeakLock
projects.description: Designed a pressure-sensing valve that instantly shuts off damaged sprinkler systems with home and industrial applications.

projects.title: Portfolio Website
projects.description: A custom Next.js/Tailwind portfolio showcasing my projects, rotating text animations, and responsive design to highlight my skills and experience.
